title: Magnetic field - rotation of magnetic dipole

content.question: A bar magnet lies on a surface with negligible friction and is free to rotate. The magnet is brought into an external magnetic field with its north pole oriented to the left, as shown. Which of the following is the orientation of the bar magnet once it stops moving?

choices.label: The figure shows a vertical bar magnet labeled “North Pole Oriented Toward the Top of the Page.”
The figure shows a horizontal bar magnet labeled “North Pole Oriented to the Right.”
The figure shows a vertical bar magnet labeled “North Pole Oriented Toward the Bottom of the Page.”
The figure shows a horizontal bar magnet labeled “North Pole Into Page.”

content.answer: The figure shows a vertical bar magnet labeled “North Pole Oriented Toward the Top of the Page.”
